title: I got false leaver bustered
body: I got punished by leaver buster when I lost my connection if there is an admin that can help me please remove it. Also Garen in URF is too op.

replies.body:
Even though you got that punishment due to your connection cutting out, that doesn't negate the fact that your teammates were left without a full team. Sometimes these leaverbusters should be viewed as a warning sign: if you keep queueing up with these connection issues you may end up getting hit with longer punishments. 

Let's take a step back and make sure to fix this up before queueing up again. You might be able to have a more stable connection with an ethernet cord, but let's be sure to run through some general network troubleshooting with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

So I got leaverbustered after my ISP had an outage. I Guess I Should not queue up because my ISP could have a outage and its my fault because I chose to get internet from the only ISP in the area. That's stupid. Automating a system to punish people is stupid.

Question... did you leave the game before it was over?... Answer... Yes.

The reason doesnt matter, and you dont get leaverbusted over a single game.. To get this punishment you had to have left multiple games in a short period of time.  Meaning you either rage quit a lot, or you have a lot of connection issues.  Either way this ruins the game for 9 other people and you keep doing it.  Fix your shit or get punished.  its really not that hard of a concept...
